release.description: SLF4J, commonVFS removal, depencies upgrade et maven 3.1 build.
release.action: Removed commonVFS dependency and vfs printing method as requested by Harald.
Upgraded shade and site dependency/plugin.
Build validated on maven 3.1.

release.description: SLF4J and commonVFS filesystem printing features.
release.action: Switched logging system from log4j to SLF4J (logback implementation)
Added ant build file to make launchers easier to run.
Added ant build file to make localhost PrintAttributes ant-compliant.
Added Log4j dependency to make more usable logs
Added Joda Time dependency to deal with dates in an easier way.
Added toString functions to PrintJobAttributes to make text outputs easier to read (textile output).
Added helper getters to PrintJobAttributes to get Dates, and other infos that are null if no client is provided (nb pages, ...).
Added PrinterList and cups.report.redmine ant task to make report on cups server easier.
Removed as much System.out and System.err as possible and replaced them by log4j log statements.
Added logos to user stories.
Project build mavenized.
Original site ported as best as possible to standard maven site.
Updated http-client from 4.1.3 to httpclient-4.2.3, and hence, by transitivty, httpcore from 4.1.4 to 4.2.3 and commons-codec from 1.4 to 1.6.
Some minor code changes (printStacck trace removes, System.exit(1) added, import reorg.

Added PrintCups4jPdfDoc class to org.cups4j.test. This simple class allows print testing using the URL version, to a dedicated printer. It prints the pdf version of the mavenized cups4j website. It also shows how to deal with some simple attributes.
Modified some logs layout in the documentaion to make pdf output nicer to read (text truncated).
Added some TODO tags to mention that call to Vector Class should me upgraded to ArrayList as Vector is now obsolete.
Minor Bugfixes

API bug fix (Important, this can break your code without compile errors) : when providing attributes to print jobs, those must be separated by '#' instead of ' '. This needed to be changed in order to allow attribute values containing blanks.

API change - CupsClient provides new operations:
hold job cancel job move job

Minor code refactorings.
performance patches applied (Thanks to Benoit Wiart) smaller code improvements
Duplex and other print job attributes were ignored by cups

deprecated print() methods in CupsPrinter removed documents for print jobs can be provided as byte[] or InputStream internal buffering of printable documents removed in order to support streaming changed dependencies to apache httpclient-4.0.3 and httpcore-4.1 (still works with httpclient 4.0 and httpcore-4.0.1) obsolete dependencies removed
